name: Highway to Shell
description:
Highway to Shell

An Endless Undead-Water Swimmer Rhythm Punching Game (EUWSRPG) brought into un-life as a Sound Design Assignment concerning Sonification for University.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move Sideways
X - Melee (Eat Enemy in Front of You)
C - Laser (Kill all Enemy in your Lane)
V - Bomb (Kill Row of Enemies in front of You)

Adjust the Input Offset depending on how laggy your Input is shown on the Attack Response Graph above.

We hope you like our (un) fun-dead  prototype!
